com.android.layoutlib.bridge.android

Class BridgeIInputMethodManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.layoutlib.bridge.android.BridgeIInputMethodManager

  • public class BridgeIInputMethodManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic implementation of IInputMethodManager that does nothing.
